Title: Fines imposed for failure to move over
Summary: Imposes fines for failure to exercise due care and move over when approaching parked, stopped or standing motor vehicles on the shoulder of a highway.
LawCode: Amd ยง1800, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to fines imposed for failure to exercise due care and move over when approaching parked, stopped or standing motor vehicles on the shoulder of a highway
